guide.introduction:
A free PDF file includes instructions on acquiring parts, making and using glow-in-the-dark gadgets from Karl Higham ~the Putt Guru... Long time putting instructor and maker/designer of sidesaddle putters.

FILE:http://puttmagic.com/GLOWPUB.pdf

WEBSITE: http://puttmagic.com
guide.introduction_rendered:
A free PDF file includes instructions on acquiring parts, making and using glow-in-the-dark gadgets from Karl Higham ~the Putt Guru... Long time putting instructor and maker/designer of sidesaddle putters.

FILE:http://puttmagic.com/GLOWPUB.pdf

WEBSITE: http://puttmagic.com
guide.summary: Shows how to make and use glow-in-the-dark gadgets for putting alignment and establishing an auto pilot putting routine.
guide.title: Glow-in-the-Dark Golf Putting Visualization & Trainer
